Name: 13 Cycles: Chaos Control
About the game: Creation and control in a rogue-lite environment! Intense 2D parkour on a procedurally generated planet! Trillions of your own abilities to create and combo Physics-based weapons! Change the environment to suit your ability experiments! Enemies with randomly generated stats, who evolve as you evolve in power! 13 stars to challenge you and bless you! Online multiplayer for even more ability complexity together! After 13 Cycles of mindless Chaos going to Growth going to Force going to Rift and then restarting as primordial Chaos you, the world, gained consciousness and the shock of it split you into tiny fragments. As one of them, you reclaim your wholeness while wielding the chaos in the way you desire.
